text: The internal spermatic fascia (infundibuliform fascia) (Le deuxième fascia de Webster) is a thin layer, which loosely invests the spermatic cord; it is a continuation downward of the transverse fascia. ==Additional images== File:Gray1144.png|The scrotum. File:Mesorchium.svg|Schematic drawing of a cross-section through the vaginal process. ==References== ==External links== * - "The inguinal canal and derivation of the layers of the spermatic cord." * * () Category:Scrotum
title: Internal spermatic fascia
